about.section.desc:
From feasibility studies and surveys to constructible, BIM-based design for roads, railways, bridges, and water systems.
We support international consultants, public authorities, and developers with technically sound, coordinated, and buildable engineering solutions.

Why NB Engineering Consulting

  • Engineering-driven approach, not template-based design
  • Strong multidisciplinary mindset (rail, roads, structures, hydraulics)
  • Focus on constructability and real-world constraints
  • Advanced BIM-based workflows for coordination and decision-making
  • Experience working alongside international consultants and IFI-funded projects
  • We operate at the intersection of engineering, data, and buildability.
